reviews.review: Perfect game.
Very good game, love the humour and game play, personal Favourite. Community made map's really keep the enjoyment for me, Would highly recommend.

Игра до сих пор остаётся одной из любимых.
Непростые головоломки и атмосфера в игре не дают устать и держат в напряжении одновременно.
Прошёл на несколько раз и каждый- как в первый.
Определённо стоит внимания, если, конечно, остались люди, не игравшие в этот шедевр.

A Classic

I bought this game during the last steam sale and at the moment it's on sale again for less than 1 €.
For this price Portal 2 is just an awesome deal.

The riddles are interesting and you can do fun stuff in many of the later levels besides just completing them.
The story is simple but the the robots you are interacting with have a nice sense of humor and will keep you entertained during the playthrough.
Multiplayer with a good friend is also just a lot of fun.

If there are people out there that don't have this game by now don't hesitate and buy it.
The fun/money ratio is just too good to miss out!

A fun puzzle game for most everyone. If you care about the story then playing Portal 1 helps a lot, but you can also jump in here and have a good time as well. Aside from that, I've seen a lot of new PC gamers pick this up and enjoy it so it seems like it does a good job of easing players into first person shooting and thinking in a virtual 3d space. I'd recommend this to just about anyone.
Really good and a great sequel to portal

Portal 2 was one of the first games I ever bought when i first started getting into gaming, way back when I was a dirty console gamer. I never played the campaign and only utilized the co-op with my sister so many of the references flew right over my head. I can say, I am SO happy i decided to buy it for pc. It has so much more depth then I initially thought and easily raised to one of my top 5 favorite games. The puzzles are the perfect level of difficulty and the story so fun to follow! Overall: 10/10 will most definitley play again and again!
This game is cool cause you can jump through portals. You can't do that in real life. Get this game so you can do that in not real life!
